text: Kjetil Knutsen (born 2 October 1968) is a Norwegian football coach who is the head coach of Eliteserien club Bodø/Glimt. Knutsen started his manager career at Åsane. After Knutsen was sacked from his position as head coach in Åsane, he joined Bodø/Glimt as assistant coach under head coach Aasmund Bjørkan. In 2018, Knutsen became head coach for Bodø/Glimt after Aasmund Bjørkan became sports director. They finished the 2019 Eliteserien in second place, and Knutsen received the Eliteserien Coach of the Year award for this accomplishment. ==Managerial statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align: center" |- !rowspan="2"| Team !rowspan="2"| From !rowspan="2"| To !colspan="5"|Record |- ! ! ! ! ! |- |Bodø/Glimt | 1 January 2018 | Present |- ! colspan="3"| Total |} ==Honours== ===Club=== Bodø/Glimt *Eliteserien: Runners-up 2019 ===Individual=== *Eliteserien Coach of the Year: 2019 ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bergen Category:Norwegian football managers Category:Eliteserien players Category:FK Bodø/Glimt managers Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Kjetil Knutsen
